ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: VCE was established in the year 1999 with quite a frugal number of UG programs, grew over the years in enormity with branches of study and specialization. It has mustered strength proportionate to the resources at its disposal. The college is approved by AICTE, has its permanent affiliation with the JNTUH University and accreditation from NAAC with the CGPA of 3.24 on four-point scale, with five of its UG programs accredited by NBA. The College profoundly holds the recognition as Scientific Industrial Research Organization (SIRO) by DST. It has commenced NRI admissions from the academic year 2016-2017, besides UGC recognizing it under the accordance of Colleges with Potential for Excellence (CPE) and enlisted as autonomous institution from the year 2014. VCE is also an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Institution. The college has been commended with a AAA+ grading by Careers360 magazine for the years 2015-2016 and 2016-2017. As regards to Research Projects, the college has earmarked allocation of budget as supportive source towards projects proposed for sustainability have been funded under a special consortium. VCE undertakes a suitable mode of identifying the patent titles granted and licensed to the faculty. The college takes the initiative to depute its faculty members to represent and for their expert guidance with the responsibility as resource persons. The college, has sponsored the faculty on foreign visits for paper presentation and to chair the conferences. The college appreciates students undergoing certification courses/training from institutions of repute as lateral training in the concerned branches of study. Over the past few years the college has established a lead with a study increase in the number of campus placements which is a manifest for a phenomenal growth. Obviously it is a sustained effort to have collaborated with the premiers like TCS, CSC, TECH MAHINDRA, POLARIS, APPS ASSOCIATES, FLIPKART, NTT DATA, and MYSMARTPRICE, etc. The college has entered in to a several Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with different industrial organizations of prime importance with a panel of listed activities to aimed at entrepreneurship and studentâ€™s training and staff parallely. The college has evinced keen interest towards ongoing trends of demand and supply on reciprocal basis and exchange for cooperation in faculty and staff scholarship. The college established a lead in mobilizing membership into some of the professional bodies namely IEEE, ISTE, IETE, CSI, IE, IAENG, IME, ACM, NPTEL and IUCEE etc. and MOUâ€™s with EDCIL (India) Ltd., IBM, ITU, TCS, NSIC, TechM, LS DAWAR & CO, etc. are worth mentioning in the direction. The college has commissioned a 100kwp roof top mounted solar power plant to meet the exigency at the college. The college has assigned consultancy services under the care of certain senior faculty members. The objective to shift the technology to rural areas, the students are encouraged to understand the life styles problems of health and education at the country side. The college has commissioned pilot implementation from 22-08-2015 under the auspicious of EPICS the students are motivated to generate thought process among them.

A Molecule called hemoglobin is found in red blood cells that holds oxygen all over the body.Hemoglobin is elastic, round and stable in a healthy human.This makes it possible to float across red blood cells.But the composition of hemoglobin is unhealthy if you have sick cell disease.It is forming rods that clump. It refers to compact and bent red blood cells.The odd cells obstruct the flow of blood.It is dangerous and can result in severe discomfort,organ damage,heartstrokes, and other symptoms.
